history.proof: intros A l f g H. apply filter_ext_in_iff. intros x Hx. qsimpl time: 1. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros A l f g H.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params si : sorted_interface misi : max_index_sanity_interface smsi : state_machine_safety_interface lmi : log_matching_interface A : Type l : list A f, g : A -> bool H : forall x : A, In x l -> f x = true x : A Hx : In x l Unable to unify "f ?M1648 = true" with "f x && g x = g x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
si: sorted_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface

Goal:
forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (f g : A -> bool), (forall x : A, In x l -> f x = true) -> filter (fun x : A => f x && g x) l = filter (fun x : A => g x) l

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
filter : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments
filter_ext : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, filter f l = filter g l
filter_except_one : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (f g : A -> bool) (x : A) (xs : list A), (forall y : A, In y xs -> x <> y -> f y = g y) -> g x = false -> filter f (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = filter g xs
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
filter_ext_in_iff : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a)
ext_in_filter : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
SetoidList.filter_split : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall ltA : A -> A -> Prop, RelationClasses.StrictOrder ltA -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eqA (Morphisms.respectful eqA iff)) ltA -> forall f : A -> bool, (forall x y : A, f x = true -> f y = false -> ltA x y) -> forall l : list A, Sorted.Sorted ltA l -> l = filter f l ++ filter (fun x : A => negb (f x)) l
filter_true_id : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (xs : list A), (forall x : A, In x xs -> f x = true) -> filter f xs = xs
filter_map : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> map f l = map g l
In_filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l l' : list A), filter f l = l' -> In x l' -> In x l
SetoidList.removeA_filter : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (eqA_dec : forall x y : A, {eqA x y} + {~ eqA x y}) (x : A) (l : list A), SetoidList.removeA (eqA:=eqA) eqA_dec x l = filter (fun y : A => if eqA_dec x y then false else true) l
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
filter_fun_ext_eq : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (xs : list A), (forall a : A, In a xs -> f a = g a) -> filter f xs = filter g xs
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
ext_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = map g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
not_in_filter_false : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> ~ In x (filter f l) -> f x = false
SetoidList.filter_InA : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (f : A -> bool), Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eqA eq) f -> forall (l : list A) (x : A), SetoidList.InA eqA x (filter f l) < -> SetoidList.InA eqA x l /\ f x = true
filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), In x (filter f l) < -> In x l /\ f x = true
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i'_le_i : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i' <= i -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i_lt_i' : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i < i' -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i'
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
remove_filter_commute : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (f : A -> bool) (x : A), remove A_eq_dec x (filter f l) = filter f (remove A_eq_dec x l)
filter_partition : forall (A : Type) (l1 : list A) (f : A -> bool) (l2 : list A) (x : A) (l1' l2' : list A), NoDup (l1 ++ x :: l2) -> filter f (l1 ++ x :: l2) = l1' ++ x :: l2' -> filter f l1 = l1' /\ filter f l2 = l2'
SetoidList.In_InfA : forall (A : Type) (ltA : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) (x : A), (forall y : A, In y l -> ltA x y) -> Sorted.HdRel ltA x l
SetoidList.In_InA : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> SetoidList.InA eqA x l
List.filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l' : list A), filter f (l ++ l') = filter f l ++ filter f l'

```coq
intros A l f g H.
apply filter_ext_in_iff.
intros x Hx.
apply H.
Qed.

original: intros A l f g H. apply filter_ext_in_iff. intros x Hx. apply H.
